TestCase.name: testFullFilterMatchWithWatermark
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE LOWER(d) = 'hello'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(LOWER($3), _UTF-16LE'hello')]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, watermark=[$2], filter=[equals(lower(d), 'hello')]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPartialFilterMatchWithWatermark
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE LOWER(d) = 'h' AND d IS NOT NULL

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(LOWER($3), _UTF-16LE'h'), IS NOT NULL($3))]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, b, c, d], where=[d IS NOT NULL]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, watermark=[$2], filter=[equals(lower(d), 'h')]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testPartialFilterMatchWithWatermark
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE LOWER(d) = 'h' AND d IS NOT NULL

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(LOWER($3), _UTF-16LE'h'), IS NOT NULL($3))]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, b, c, d], where=[d IS NOT NULL]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, watermark=[$2], filter=[equals(lower(d), 'h')]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testNoFilterMatchWithWatermark
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE b > 5

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 5)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, b, c, d], where=[(b > 5)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, watermark=[$2], filter=[]]], fields=[a, b, c, d])

TestCase.name: testComputedColumnPushdownAcrossWatermark
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM WithWatermark WHERE lowercase_name = 'foo'

LogicalProject(event_time=[$0], name=[$1], lowercase_name=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, _UTF-16LE'foo')]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[event_time], watermark=[$0]) +- LogicalProject(event_time=[$0], name=[$1], lowercase_name=[LOWER($1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, WithWatermark]])

Calc(select=[Reinterpret(event_time) AS event_time, name, CAST(_UTF-16LE'foo':VARCHAR(2147483647) CHARACTER SET "UTF-16LE") AS lowercase_name]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, WithWatermark, watermark=[$0], filter=[equals(lower(name), 'foo')]]], fields=[event_time, name])

TestCase.name: testFullPushdownWithoutWatermarkAssigner
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM NoWatermark WHERE LOWER(name) = 'foo' AND UPPER(name) = 'FOO'

LogicalProject(name=[$0], event_time=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(LOWER($0), _UTF-16LE'foo'), =(UPPER($0), _UTF-16LE'FOO'))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NoWatermark]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NoWatermark, filter=[and(equals(lower(name), 'foo'), equals(upper(name), 'FOO'))]]], fields=[name, event_time])

TestCase.name: testFilterPushdownWithUdf
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM UdfTable WHERE UPPER(f) = 'welcome'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], f=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(UPPER($4), _UTF-16LE'welcome')]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[func(func($3, $0), $0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[func($2, $0)], f=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable]])

Calc(select=[a, b, Reinterpret(c) AS c, func(c, a) AS d, f]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable, watermark=[func(func(func($2, $0), $0), $0)], filter=[equals(upper(f), 'welcome')]]], fields=[a, b, c, f])

TestCase.name: testFilterPushdownWithUdf
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM UdfTable WHERE UPPER(f) = 'welcome'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], f=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=(UPPER($4), _UTF-16LE'welcome')]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[c], watermark=[func(func($3, $0), $0)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[func($2, $0)], f=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable]])

Calc(select=[a, b, Reinterpret(c) AS c, func(c, a) AS d, f]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, UdfTable, watermark=[func(func(func($2, $0), $0), $0)], filter=[equals(upper(f), 'welcome')]]], fields=[a, b, c, f])

TestCase.name: testPartialPushdownWithoutWatermarkAssigner
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM NoWatermark WHERE LOWER(name) = 'foo' AND name IS NOT NULL

LogicalProject(name=[$0], event_time=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(LOWER($0), _UTF-16LE'foo'), IS NOT NULL($0))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NoWatermark]])
Calc(select=[name, event_time], where=[name IS NOT NULL]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NoWatermark, filter=[equals(lower(name), 'foo')]]], fields=[name, event_time])
